verses.name: Psalms 89:43
verses.text: Thou hast also turned the edge of his sword, and hast not made him to stand in the battle.

verses.name: Psalms 89:44
verses.text: Thou hast made his glory to cease, and cast his throne down to the ground.

verses.name: Psalms 89:45
verses.text: The days of his youth hast thou shortened: thou hast covered him with shame. Selah.

verses.name: Psalms 89:46
verses.text: How long, Lord? wilt thou hide thyself for ever? shall thy wrath burn like fire?

verses.name: Psalms 89:47
verses.text: Remember how short my time is: wherefore hast thou made all men in vain?
